sen.j: 舞鶴市郷土資料館（まいづるし きょうどしりょうかん）は、京都府舞鶴市北田辺の舞鶴市民会館の2階にある舞鶴市の歴史を語る資料館。
sen.e: Maizuru-city local history museum is a history museum specializing in the history of Maizuru City, located on the second floor of the Maizuru-city civic hall, Kitatanabe, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

Maizuru-city local history museum is a history museum specializing in the history of Maizuru City, located on the second floor of the Maizuru-city civic hall, Kitatanabe, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

Maizuru City local history museum is a history museum specializing in the history of Maizuru City, located on the second floor of the Maizuru City civic hall, Kitatanabe, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 舞鶴地域の文化遺産を保存・展示する施設として、市内の遺跡から発掘された土器や石器、旧家の古文書などが、時代別に陳列されており、古代から現在までの舞鶴の歴史を伝える展示場である。
sen.e: As a facility to store and exhibit cultural heritage of Maizuru area, it is an exhibition hall which exhibits the history of Maizuru City from the ancient times to the present day, by displaying historical articles, such as earthenware and stoneware excavated at ruins in the city and old documents donated by families of pedigree, for each separate period,

As a facility for storing and exhibiting the cultural heritage of the Maizuru area, it is an exhibition hall which exhibits the history of Maizuru City from ancient times to the present day, by displaying historical articles, such as earthenware and stoneware excavated at ruins in the city and old documents donated by families of pedigree, for each separate period.

As a facility for storing and exhibiting the cultural heritage of the Maizuru area, it is an exhibition hall which exhibits the history of Maizuru City from ancient times to the present day, by displaying historical articles, such as earthenware and stoneware excavated at ruins in the city and old documents from families of pedigree, for each separate period.
sen.cmt: donated by はこの場合正確ではないと思われ、from に修正しました。

sen.j: 約100平方m2の展示室には、縄文時代の暮らしぶりを示す「桑飼下遺跡」から出た埋葬用のかめや、土製の耳飾りをはじめ、古墳時代の刀、飛鳥時代に都へ納める品物に付けた木簡などの出土品も数多く展示されている。
sen.e: In the hundred-square-meter exhibition room, there are exhibited a large number of excavated articles, such as burial jars and earrings made of clay excavated at "Kuwagaishimo ruins", which describe about lives in the Jomon period, swords manufactured in the Tumulus period, wood slips which were attached to articles to be conveyed to the capital city in the Asuka period, etc.

In the hundred-square-meter exhibition room, there are exhibited a large number of excavated articles, such as burial jars and earrings made of clay excavated at "Kuwagaishimo ruins"; which describe lives in the Jomon period, swords manufactured in the Tumulus period; wood slips which were attached to articles to be conveyed to the capital city in the Asuka period; etc.

In the hundred-square-meter exhibition room, there are exhibited a large number of excavated articles, such as burial jars and earrings made of clay excavated at "Kuwagaishimo site"; which describe life in the Jomon period, swords manufactured in the Tumulus period; wood slips which were attached to articles to be conveyed to the capital city in the Asuka period; etc.

sen.j: 毎年、市民からの寄贈品展などの企画展が年4〜5回開かれる。
sen.e: Exhibitions, such as an exhibition of articles donated by people of Maizuru City, are held four or five times a year.
Exhibitions, such as an exhibition of articles donated by people of Maizuru City, are held four or five times a year.
Exhibitions, such as an exhibition of articles donated by people of Maizuru City, are held four or five times a year.

sen.j: また、特別収蔵庫に保管する糸井文庫などの貴重な資料も閲覧することができる。
sen.e: Furthermore, precious materials such as Itoi-bunko stored in a special storage area can also be viewed.
Furthermore, precious materials such as Itoi-bunko stored in a special storage area can also be viewed.
Furthermore, precious materials such as Itoi-bunko stored in a special storage area can also be viewed.

sen.j: 1975年（昭和50年）：北吸地区にある市役所横に建設・開館。
sen.e: 1975 (S50): Maizuru-city local history museum was built and opened adjacent the city hall in Kitasui.
1975 (S50): Maizuru-city local history museum was built and opened adjacent to the city hall in Kitasui.
1975: Maizuru-city local history museum was built and opened adjacent to the city hall in Kitasui.

sen.j: 1993年（平成5年）：市役所別館建設のため、一時休館。
sen.e: 1993 (H05): The service was suspended temporarily due to the construction of the city hall annex.
1993 (H05): Service was suspended temporarily due to the construction of the city hall annex.
1993: Service was suspended temporarily due to the construction of the city hall annex.

sen.j: 1994年（平成6年）：北田辺の市民会館2階に移り再オープン。
sen.e: 1994 (H06): The museum was moved to the second floor of the Maizuru-city civic hall in Kitatanabe and the service restarted.
1994 (H06): The museum was moved to the second floor of the Maizuru-city civic hall in Kitatanabe and service restarted.
1994: The museum was moved to the second floor of the civic hall in Kitatanabe and reopened.
sen.cmt: (H06)を削除しました。Miyazu-city を削除しました。service started→reopened

sen.j: 所在地：京都府舞鶴市北田辺
